first_para: Christopher Laurie Malthouse, known as Kit Malthouse, born 27 October 1966, is conservative parliamentary candidate for North West Hampshire in the general election slated for 7 May 2015. A former Deputy Mayor of London for Business and Enterprise, politician, businessman and occasional writer, he is a Conservative and a member of the London Assembly representing the West Central constituency, which encompasses the City of Westminster, the London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham and the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea. He was formerly Chair of the Metropolitan Police Authority and the first Statutory Deputy Mayor for Policing.

full.extract:
Christopher Laurie Malthouse, known as Kit Malthouse, born 27 October 1966, is conservative parliamentary candidate for North West Hampshire in the general election slated for 7 May 2015. A former Deputy Mayor of London for Business and Enterprise, politician, businessman and occasional writer, he is a Conservative and a member of the London Assembly representing the West Central constituency, which encompasses the City of Westminster, the London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham and the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea. He was formerly Chair of the Metropolitan Police Authority and the first Statutory Deputy Mayor for Policing.
A former city councillor and Deputy Leader of Westminster City Council, London he is a member of the Conservative Party.
full.title: Kit Malthouse
